Table	Create Table
cms_page_sections	CREATE TABLE `cms_page_sections` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pageId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `sectionType` enum('hero','text_block','cta','features','testimonials','pricing_table','faq','image_gallery','video','stats','team','contact_form','newsletter','custom_html','divider','spacer') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(300) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `subtitle` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `backgroundColor` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `textColor` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `paddingTop` int(11) DEFAULT '48',
  `paddingBottom` int(11) DEFAULT '48',
  `sortOrder` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `isVisible` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `fk_1` (`pageId`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`pageId`) REFERENCES `cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM`.`cms_pages` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
